import { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { delUser } from '../../store/actions' import Button from '../UI/Button/Button' import Modal from '../UI/Modal/Modal' import './UserItem.css' export default function UserItem({ id, name, email }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [modal, setModal] = useState(false) return (
  • {modal ? : <> }

    {name}

    {email}
    • ) }
